DO ANY OF THESE COMBOS EXIST?

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Major HOF'er with a very rare back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dan Koochin
seen or verified...(I don't own them)
Cobb red portrait Drum
Cobb red portrait Uzit
Cobb red portrait Red Hindu
Cobb bat off shoulder Drum (don't ask - no one's seen it ages)
Cobb bat off shoulder Uzit

Walter Johnson hands at chest Drum
Walter Johnson hands at chest Broadleaf 460

Mathewson dark cap Broadleaf 460

Cy Young Broadleaf 460

in Drum backs I have never seen Mathewson or Young, and your quest for
a genuine Drum Cobb is complicated by the existence of more 're-backed' copies 
than there are originals...
